value.name: Jimmy Atchison's family say they have new evidence to release in his police shooting case
value.description: ATLANTA — The family of Jimmy Atchison, an Atlanta man who was shot and killed while hiding in a closet in early 2019 by a now-ex APD officer, said Wednesday they have new evidence in his case ...

value.name: Last summer’s protests spark increase in Black activism in Atlanta
value.description: In the year since Atlanta's Black Lives Matter protests over the death of George Floyd at the hands of police, dozens of new, smaller alliances have emerged in Georgia to fight against discrimination and intolerance alongside more established organizations.

about.name: Timeline of the Syrian Civil War

value.name: Americans Gathered to Mark Anniversary of George Floyd’s Death
value.description: President Biden hosted Mr. Floyd’s family at the White House one year after he was murdered, with rallies held in Minneapolis and several other cities.

value.name: Remembering George Floyd: Atlanta pays tribute to him, others, a year later
value.description: Hannah Williams said her family was lucky to have seen police body camera footage of the death of her brother, Matthew Zadok Williams. On April 12, Matthew Zadok Williams was shot by DeKalb County Police and died inside his home.

value.name: Activist on Chauvin trial guilty verdict: 'There's a George Floyd in every town'
value.description: Dozens of activists came to a mural located in downtown Atlanta not knowing the outcome of the verdict, but the plan was to march in solidarity no matter what.

video.name: Activist on Chauvin trial guilty verdict: 'There's a George Floyd in every town'
